mapper.select: select t.id as key, case when t.table_comment = '' and d.db_name = '' then t.table_name || '（' || d.db_code || '）' when t.table_comment = '' then t.table_name || '（' || d.db_name || '｜' || d.db_code || '）' when d.db_name = '' then t.table_comment || '｜' || t.table_name || '（' || d.db_code || '）' else t.table_comment || '｜' || t.table_name || '（' || d.db_name || '｜' || d.db_code || '）' end as label from db_table t left join db_info d on d.id = t.db_id join app_info a on a.db_id = t.db_id where a.id = #{appId}

select t.id, t.table_name, t.table_comment, t.update_time, d.db_name, d.db_code from db_table t left join db_info d on d.id = t.db_id
and t.db_id = #{dbId}
and t.table_name like concat('%', #{tableName}, '%')
order by t.db_id
select t.id, t.db_id,t.table_name, t.table_comment, d.db_name, d.db_code, d.db_type from db_table t left join db_info d on d.id = t.db_id where t.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into db_table(db_id,table_name, table_comment, update_time) values (#{dbId},#{tableName}, #{tableComment}, #{accessTime})
